text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya cayatane sihamtara babe sihamtara karyaralika sobhaniya karaichila arau kaichila, ‘aji manuhara majata konorae'i tomalokara oparata bijaya labha karaiba noraarae, arau niscaya ma'i tomalokara kasate'i arasthana karaima’. Eteke yetiya duyo dala parasparae drsyamana ha’la tetiya si picha homhokile arau ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara paraa samparkamukta, niscaya ma'i enekuraa kiba dekhi acho yito tomaloke dekha noporaa. Niscaya ma'i allahaka bhaya karao’, arau allaha sasti pradanata ati kathora
